remarks.format: ## Examples L’exemple suivant montre comment écrire un journal de base qui répond aux événements de build.The following example shows how to write a basic logger that responds to build events. [!code-csharp[msbuild_BasicLogger#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/msbuild_BasicLogger/CS/msbuild_BasicLogger.cs#1)]
